CustomField.description: US-0007824 - EU Advertising CPM Calculator. US-0009452 - [Ads 2020] Change Targeting Fee calc
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( LEFT(Pricebook_Name__c, 2) = "DE", TEXT(Billing_Category__c)="CPM"), CASE ( Targeting_Type__c , "Standard",5.00, "Premium",10.00, "Custom",15.00, "Individuell",15.00,0) ,0)
CustomField.label: Targeting Fee2
